name: FacePositionInfo
description: The information of the detected human face.

parameters.x: The x coordinate (px) of the human face in the local video. Taking the top left corner of the captured video as the origin, the x coordinate represents the relative lateral displacement of the top left corner of the human face to the origin.

parameters.y: The y coordinate (px) of the human face in the local video. Taking the top left corner of the captured video as the origin, the y coordinate represents the relative longitudinal displacement of the top left corner of the human face to the origin.

parameters.width: The width (px) of the human face in the captured video.

parameters.height: The height (px) of the human face in the captured video.

parameters.distance: The distance between the human face and the device screen (cm).
